events.text:
What’s that? This town is much like yours? Well maybe it’s the houses, it's a very common building style. 
Speaking of home wouldn’t your parents be very worried about you? 
Oh, You’re an orphan? I’m terrible sorry. 
Even though I’ve never met my parents I couldn’t imagine what you’ve been through. 
But now with that last diary. About how I was just a figment of imagination for Lilian. I-[pause=0.3] I don’t know what to think. 
[shake rate=5 level=10]I’m real right?[/shake] 
[shake rate=5 level=10]Like you can see and hear me?[/shake] 
But you DID fall all the way down and might have hit your head.
[shake rate=5 level=10]Oh my gosh. I actually might not be real![/shake] 
[shake rate=5 level=10]But that-[pause=0.3] you- [pause=0.3]Lilian-[pause=0.3] I-[/shake]  
Ok, ok you're right. I should just calm down and focus on getting the remaining GREAT SEEDS. 
Let’s go.
